mapper.sql: USERID, USERNAME, USERPASSWORD, REGISTERSITEID, AUTHORITY, REALNAME, CARDID, PHONE, DEPARTMENTID, LASTLOGINTIME, REMARK, ROLEID, POLICENUMBER, OLDERID, DEPTGRADE, CREATETIME, CANDEL, ISDEL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, ISADMIN
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_USERS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_USERS (USERID, USERNAME, USERPASSWORD, REGISTERSITEID, AUTHORITY, REALNAME, CARDID, PHONE, DEPARTMENTID, LASTLOGINTIME, REMARK, ROLEID, POLICENUMBER, OLDERID, DEPTGRADE, CREATETIME, CANDEL, ISDEL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, ISADMIN) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{registerSiteId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{authority,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{realName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{carId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{phone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{roleId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{policeNumber,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{oldErId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{deptGrade,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{canDel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

update TB_USERS
